code.value:
from typing import Optional, Union

from langchain.llms import BaseLLM
from langchain_community.chat_models.openai import ChatOpenAI

from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import BaseLanguageModel, NestedDict


class ChatOpenAIComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "ChatOpenAI"
    description = "`OpenAI` Chat large language models API."

    def build_config(self):
        return {
            "max_tokens": {
                "display_name": "Max Tokens",
                "field_type": "int",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
            },
            "model_kwargs": {
                "display_name": "Model Kwargs",
                "field_type": "NestedDict",
                "advanced": True,
                "required": False,
            },
            "model_name": {
                "display_name": "Model Name",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "options": [
                    "gpt-4-turbo-preview",
                    "gpt-4-0125-preview",
                    "gpt-4-1106-preview",
                    "gpt-4-vision-preview",
                    "gpt-3.5-turbo-0125",
                    "gpt-3.5-turbo-1106",
                ],
            },
            "openai_api_base": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Base",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "info": (
                    "The base URL of the OpenAI API. Defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.\n\n"
                    "You can change this to use other APIs like JinaChat, LocalAI and Prem."
                ),
            },
            "openai_api_key": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Key",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "password": True,
            },
            "temperature": {
                "display_name": "Temperature",
                "field_type": "float",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "value": 0.7,
            },
        }

    def build(
        self,
        max_tokens: Optional[int] = 256,
        model_kwargs: NestedDict = {},
        model_name: str = "gpt-4-1106-preview",
        openai_api_base: Optional[str] = None,
        openai_api_key: Optional[str] = None,
        temperature: float = 0.7,
    ) -> Union[BaseLanguageModel, BaseLLM]:
        if not openai_api_base:
            openai_api_base = "https://api.openai.com/v1"
        return ChatOpenAI(
            max_tokens=max_tokens,
            model_kwargs=model_kwargs,
            model=model_name,
            base_url=openai_api_base,
            api_key=openai_api_key,
            temperature=temperature,
        )
code.name: code

openai_api_base.name: openai_api_base
openai_api_base.info:
The base URL of the OpenAI API. Defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.

You can change this to use other APIs like JinaChat, LocalAI and Prem.

input_context.value:
The Preferences Manager must support role based access
The Preferences Manager must only support authenticated access
The Preferences Manager must log all authentication events
The Preferences Manager must ensure that all authentication credentials are stored securely
The Preferences Manager must be resistent to replay attacks
"The Preferences Manager must allow notification preferences to be set at the following entity levels:
- PMS Provider Application"
The Preferences Manager must allow PEXA to configure a given notification type as either mandatory or optional within each jurisdiction
"The Preferences Manager must support the following jurisdictions:
- Australia
- UK"
The Preferences Manager must support creating additional national and/or state level jurisdictions
The Preferences Manager must allow PEXA to configure individual notifications as unavailable in a given jurisdiction
The Preferences Manager must provide a confirmation response (success or fail) for all attempts to update subscription preferences.
The Preferences Manager must allow PMS providers to subscribe their applications to one or more notifications
The Preferences Manager must allow notification preference users to subscribe to one or more notifications
The Preferences Manager must allow registered notification parties to unsubscribe from notifications
The Preferences Manager must ensure that (within a preference profile) each notification deemed mandatory is configured to be delivered at least one channel
The Preferences Manager must allow PEXA subscribers to use more than one PMS within a single jurisdiction
The Preferences Manager must allow notification service users to set individual notification preferences per jurisdiction
The Notification Manager will only send notifications that the recipient has enabled via their notification preferences
The Preferences Manager must allow notification preferences users to retrieve their current notification preferences via API
The Notification Manager must perform processing compliant with General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
The Notification Manager must be capable of sending more than 100+ notifications per hour (peak processing)
The Notification Manager must ensure that UK notifications are sent in chronological sequence for each subscriber
The Notification Manager must include criticality level within notifications
The Email Push Notification Solution must confirm a notification is enabled under notification preferences before sending
The Email Push Notification Solution must not send a notification unless the recipient has previously enabled the notification for the email channel
"The Preferences Manager must allow notification preferences to be set at the following entity levels:
- PEXA subscriber"
The Preferences Manager must allow enable a single PEXA subscriber to define preferences against multiple integrators (e.g. PMS applications)
The Preferences Manager must allow PEXA to set preferences via API for notification services
The Notification Manager must support versioning of business events
"The Preferences Manager must allow notification preferences to be set at the following entity levels:
- Individual user (e.g. a Practitoner)"
"The Preferences Manager must allow notification preferences to be set at the following entity levels:
- PMS Provider
- Corporate level (e.g. a Legal Practice)
- Role level
- Individual user"
The Preferences Manager must allow PMS providers to update their notification subscription preferences via GUI.
The Preferences Manager must support sending the notification set details to authorised external parties
The Preferences Manager must support sending the notification set details to internal PEXA services
The Preferences Manager must create a new notifications set version each time there is a change to the contained notifications
The Preferences Manager must support sending the list of notifications available under the currently active notifications set 
The Notification Manager must allow notifications to be pushed out to PEXA customer-facing applications
input_context.name: input_context

input_title.value: { "Title": "Implement role-based access control for Preferences Manager", "Description": "Define user roles and permissions to control access to the Preferences Manager based on roles." }

code.value:
from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from langchain_core.prompts import ChatPromptTemplate
from langfuse import Langfuse
import os

class PromptRetrieverToString(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "PromptRetrieverToString"
    documentation = "http://docs.axiestudio.org/components/custom"
    description = "Get prompt from Langfuse and return the prompt string"

    def build_config(self):
        return {"prompt_name": {"display_name": "Prompt name"}}

    def build(self, prompt_name: str) -> str:
        
        langfuse = Langfuse(
            secret_key=os.environ.get('LANGFLOW_LANGFUSE_SECRET_KEY', ''),
            public_key=os.environ.get('LANGFLOW_LANGFUSE_PUBLIC_KEY', ''),
            host=os.environ.get('LANGFLOW_LANGFUSE_HOST', ''),
        )
        langfuse_prompt = langfuse.get_prompt(prompt_name)
        langchain_prompt = langfuse_prompt.get_langchain_prompt()
    
        return langchain_prompt
code.name: code

node.description: Get prompt from Langfuse and return the prompt string

from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from langchain_core.prompts import ChatPromptTemplate
from langfuse import Langfuse
import os

class PromptRetrieverToString(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "PromptRetrieverToString"
    documentation = "http://docs.axiestudio.org/components/custom"
    description = "Get prompt from Langfuse and return the prompt string"

    def build_config(self):
        return {"prompt_name": {"display_name": "Prompt name"}}

    def build(self, prompt_name: str) -> str:
        
        langfuse = Langfuse(
            secret_key=os.environ.get('LANGFLOW_LANGFUSE_SECRET_KEY', ''),
            public_key=os.environ.get('LANGFLOW_LANGFUSE_PUBLIC_KEY', ''),
            host=os.environ.get('LANGFLOW_LANGFUSE_HOST', ''),
        )
        langfuse_prompt = langfuse.get_prompt(prompt_name)
        langchain_prompt = langfuse_prompt.get_langchain_prompt()
    
        return langchain_prompt

from typing import Optional, Union

from langchain.llms import BaseLLM
from langchain_community.chat_models.openai import ChatOpenAI

from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import BaseLanguageModel, NestedDict


class ChatOpenAIComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "ChatOpenAI"
    description = "`OpenAI` Chat large language models API."

    def build_config(self):
        return {
            "max_tokens": {
                "display_name": "Max Tokens",
                "field_type": "int",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
            },
            "model_kwargs": {
                "display_name": "Model Kwargs",
                "field_type": "NestedDict",
                "advanced": True,
                "required": False,
            },
            "model_name": {
                "display_name": "Model Name",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "options": [
                    "gpt-4-turbo-preview",
                    "gpt-4-0125-preview",
                    "gpt-4-1106-preview",
                    "gpt-4-vision-preview",
                    "gpt-3.5-turbo-0125",
                    "gpt-3.5-turbo-1106",
                ],
            },
            "openai_api_base": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Base",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "info": (
                    "The base URL of the OpenAI API. Defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.\n\n"
                    "You can change this to use other APIs like JinaChat, LocalAI and Prem."
                ),
            },
            "openai_api_key": {
                "display_name": "OpenAI API Key",
                "field_type": "str",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "password": True,
            },
            "temperature": {
                "display_name": "Temperature",
                "field_type": "float",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": False,
                "value": 0.7,
            },

        temperature: float = 0.7,

            api_key=openai_api_key,
            temperature=temperature,

from langchain_core.prompts import ChatPromptTemplate
from langfuse import Langfuse
import os

class PromptRetrieverToString(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "PromptRetrieverToString"

        return {"prompt_name": {"display_name": "Prompt name"}}

        langfuse = Langfuse(
            secret_key=os.environ.get('LANGFLOW_LANGFUSE_SECRET_KEY', ''),
            public_key=os.environ.get('LANGFLOW_LANGFUSE_PUBLIC_KEY', ''),
            host=os.environ.get('LANGFLOW_LANGFUSE_HOST', ''),
        )
        langfuse_prompt = langfuse.get_prompt(prompt_name)
        langchain_prompt = langfuse_prompt.get_langchain_prompt()
